creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: two-piece round pagoda with four disk-like sections; spindly finial sits on top; white pigment fragments

title: Pagoda with Darani sutra, from a set of "One Million Pagodas"
